autotransform.transformer package

Submodules

autotransform.transformer.base module

The base class and associated classes for Transformer components.

class autotransform.transformer.base.Transformer(params: autotransform.transformer.base.TParams)

Bases: Generic[autotransform.transformer.base.TParams], abc.ABC

The base for Transformer components. Transformers are used to execute changes to a codebase. A Transformer takes in a Batch and then executes all changes associated with the Batch.

_params

The paramaters that control operation of the Transformer. Should be defined using a TypedDict in subclasses

Type

TParams

bundle() → autotransform.transformer.base.TransformerBundle

Generates a JSON encodable bundle. If a component’s params are not JSON encodable this method should be overridden to provide an encodable version.

Returns

The encodable bundle.

Return type

TransformerBundle

abstract static from_data(data: Mapping[str, Any]) → autotransform.transformer.base.Transformer

Produces an instance of the component from decoded params. Implementations should assert that the data provided matches expected types and is valid.

Parameters

data (Mapping[str, Any]) – The JSON decoded params from an encoded bundle.

Returns

An instance of the Transformer.

Return type

Transformer

get_params() → autotransform.transformer.base.TParams

Gets the paramaters used to set up the Transformer.

Returns

The paramaters used to set up the Transformer.

Return type

TParams

abstract static get_type() → autotransform.transformer.type.TransformerType

Used to map Transformer components 1:1 with an enum, allowing construction from JSON.

Returns

The unique type associated with this Transformer.

Return type

TransformerType

abstract transform(batch: autotransform.batcher.base.Batch) → None

Execute a transformation against the provided Batch. All writing should be done via CachedFile’s write_content method or FileItem’s write_content method to ensure operations are easily accessible to testing and file content cache’s are kept accurate.

Parameters

batch (Batch) – The Batch that will be transformed.

autotransform.transformer.factory module

A simple factory for producing Transformers from type and param information.

class autotransform.transformer.factory.TransformerFactory

Bases: object

The factory class for Transformers. Maps a type to a Transformer.

_map

A mapping from TransformerType to the from_data function of the appropriate Transformer.

Type

autotransform.transformer.regex module

The implementation for the RegexTransformer.

class autotransform.transformer.regex.RegexTransformer(params: autotransform.transformer.base.TParams)

Bases: autotransform.transformer.single.SingleTransformer[autotransform.transformer.regex.RegexTransformerParams]

A Transformer that makes regex based changes, replacing instances of the provided pattern with the provided replacement. Useful for simple transformations. Operates on FileItems.

_params

Contains the pattern and replacement.

Type

RegexTransformerParams

autotransform.transformer.script module

The implementation for the ScriptTransformer.

class autotransform.transformer.script.ScriptTransformer(params: autotransform.transformer.base.TParams)

Bases: autotransform.transformer.base.Transformer[autotransform.transformer.script.ScriptTransformerParams]

A Transformer that makes changes using an invoked script. Sentinel values can be used in the args to supply information from the Batch. The available sentinel values for args are:

<<KEY>>: A json encoded list of the input files for a batch. If the per_item flag is set in

params, this will simply be the key of an Item.

<<EXTRA_DATA>>: A JSON encoded mapping from Item key to that Item’s extra_data. If the

per_item flag is set in params, this will simply be a JSON encoding of the Item’s extra_data. If extra_data is not present for an item, it is treated as an empty Dict.

<<METADATA>>: A JSON encoded version of the Batch’s metadata.

_FILE can be appended to any of these (i.e. <<KEY_FILE>>) and the arg will instead be replaced

with a path to a file containing the value.

_params

The script and args, along with the timeout and a per_item flag for invoking the script on each Item.

Type

ScriptTransformerParams

static from_data(data: Mapping[str, Any]) → autotransform.transformer.script.ScriptTransformer

Produces a ScriptTransformer from the provided data.

Parameters

autotransform.transformer.single module

An interface for Transformers that operate on single Items with no metadata needs.

class autotransform.transformer.single.SingleTransformer(params: autotransform.transformer.base.TParams)

Bases: Generic[autotransform.transformer.single.TParams], autotransform.transformer.base.Transformer[autotransform.transformer.single.TParams]

A simple interface for writing a Transformer that operates on an individual Item level.

transform(batch: autotransform.batcher.base.Batch) → None

Splits out all Items to be transformed.

Parameters

batch (Batch) – The Batch being transformed.

autotransform.transformer.type module

The type of Transformer, used create a 1:1 mapping.

class autotransform.transformer.type.TransformerType(value)

Bases: str, enum.Enum

A simple enum for 1:1 Transformer to type mapping.

REGEX = 'regex'
SCRIPT = 'script'

Module contents

Transformers are the core of a Schema. They take in a Batch and execute the changes to the codebase.
